snippet: After a harrowing spring injury, the Reds’ Aroldis Chapman had one of the most dominant seasons. Chapman can be a free agent after 2016, which puts the Reds in a quandary.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column remarks upon Cincinnati Reds pitcher Aroldis Chapman's outstanding play in 2014 season after rapid and complete recovery from head injury; wonders if team will be able to retain him after he becomes free agent in 2016.
lead_paragraph: After a harrowing spring injury, the Reds’ Aroldis Chapman had one of the most dominant seasons. Chapman can be a free agent after 2016, which puts the Reds in a quandary.

headline.print_headline: Pushing Limits of a Sport, and a Budget
headline.seo: Aroldis Chapman Stretches the Reds’ Budget, and the Limits of Pitching
headline.main: Pushing Limits of a Sport, and a Budget
